General.Name: Ataa Educational Co
General.Description: Ataa Educational Company engages in the establishment of national and international, kindergarten, primary, middle, and secondary schools for boys and girls in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The company operates through three segments: Education sector, Training sector, and Employment sector. It is also involved in the establishment, management, and operation and maintenance of training centers, as well as establishment of colleges and universities. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
